魨字的基本解释

魨
tún
见“鲀”。

魨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tún］
［《玉篇》音豚］
“鲀1”的繁体字。
河豚鱼。别名鯸鮧、鱼等。体圆筒形，似豚。无鳞或有刺鳞，一触物胸腹部即鼓气如球作御敌状。种类很多，中国沿海均产，有的种类能进入淡水。肉味鲜美，但肝脏、卵巢及血液等均含毒素。

魨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魨； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第07
【五音集韻】徒渾切，音豚。【玉篇】魚名。【本草集解】河魨，狀如科斗，大者尺餘，背色靑白，有黃縷，無鱗腮，目能?者有毒。一名鯸鮧。一名鰗鮧。一名䲅魚。本作豚。

Puffer
Basic explanation of words
Puffer
tún
See "puffer".
Puffer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tún］
["Jade Pian" Sound Dolphin]
Traditional characters for "鲀1".
Puffer fish. Also known as 鯸鮧, 鯸鱼, etc. The body is cylindrical, like a dolphin. It has no scales or spiny scales, and when it touches the chest and abdomen, it inflates like a ball to defend against enemies. There are many species, all of which are produced along the coast of China, and some species can enter fresh water. The meat is delicious, but the liver, ovaries and blood all contain toxins.
Puffer
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji】【Fish Character Department】　鲀; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 Page 07
【Pentagram rhyme】Turn and cut, sound dolphin. 【Jade articles】The name of the fish. 【Comprehensive Materia Medica】The puffer fish is shaped like a scorpion, the larger one is more than a chi, the back color is white, with yellow strands, no scales, and the eyes can be poisonous. A scorpionfish. A 鰗鮧. A fish. This is a dolphin.
